title: Rule Extraction
description: Explore techniques for extracting human-interpretable rules from complex models.

examples.description: Uses a fuzzy rule-based system to create interpretable decision rules for alertness classification.
examples.note: Added for its use of a fuzzy rule-based system, which enhances interpretability by creating clear decision rules for alertness classification.

trend: Translating model decisions into understandable rules that can be validated by domain experts.
